casebody.data:
MCC (XIANGTAN) HEAVY INDUSTRIAL EQUIPMENT CO., LTD., petitioner,
v.
LIEBHERR MINING & CONSTRUCTION EQUIPMENT, INC., dba Liebherr Mining Equipment Newport News Co. No. 18-167. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 15, 2018.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Virginia denied.
